title: Nathan Fillion’s ‘Not Nice’ Guy Gardner to Appear in HBO’s Lanterns Series
description: It appears that Nathan Fillion’s Guy Gardner will fare much better than his T.D.K. did. Fillion’s “jerk” of a Green Lantern, who will make his debut in James Gunn’s Superman movie this July 11, will also appear in HBO’s Lanterns series, THR and others reported on Monday. Production on Lanterns began Feb. 27. Fillion recently […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Casting News: Shailene Woodley Finds Paradise, Cristin Milioti Joins Elizabeth Olsen Pilot and More
description: Shailene Woodley has discovered Paradise, joining the buzzy Hulu drama for Season 2 in a major recurring role. According to our sister site Deadline, the Big Little Lies vet is reportedly playing a prominent survivor who is connected to Agent Xavier Collins’ (Sterling K. Brown) mission, which was set up in the Season 1 finale. […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: When Calls the Heart Season 12 Report Card: The Series Improved Greatly, But Still Has Issues
description: When Calls the Heart Season 12 has improved. Join us as we review the best and worst of our picks in the TV Fanatic report card. The post When Calls the Heart Season 12 Report Card: The Series Improved Greatly, But Still Has Issues appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Laura Nowak

title: Fierce & Fearless: Faith Mitchell’s Best Moments on Will Trent
description: Faith Mitchell has become such a fierce icon on ABC's Will Trent. Here our are favorite moments of her. The post Fierce & Fearless: Faith Mitchell’s Best Moments on Will Trent appeared first on TV Fanatic.
